about_the_game:
The invitation of external testers is now open, and you can get the pre-release internal version for free. No matter who you are, you are welcome to contact us if you are interested in our game. Contact email: gamecss@epoching.com


"Yummy" is a cute online multiplayer game. In the "Hunger Office" map, 20 hungry players will stage a "Food Show" in the office. At the beginning of the game, not only must you eat as much food as possible, but you must also always pay attention to being eaten by "something". Under the setting of "anything can be eaten, what is eaten becomes what", it is difficult for you to identify what is what. In order not to become a hungry ghost, please bring your friends to win the game!

【Choose your initial appearance】

In the "hungry office"map, your initial appearance will randomly become any office objects: a folder, a desk, a memo on the wall, a pot of flowers in the corner, and even a toilet in the bathroom (Hahahahahaha)......

【The distress after transformation】

In this crazy hungry environment, in order to win the ultimate survival, you will compete with other 19 players hiding in the office for limited "food". Because you will become something you eat, you will encounter various interesting situations: you want to eat murals on the wall, but you are a trash can on the ground; you want to be a potted plant on the table, but you accidentally swallow A very dirty ashtray was dropped; or you tried to sneak attack on other hidden players, but were eventually swallowed by other players...

【Walk, run and jump】

In order to eat more, all players who become objects will grow a pair of cute short legs. When you randomly become a mouse, you can sneak close to the computer and eat it in one bite. When you find that the situation is not good, you can run away with short legs. In the "Yummy" state, running can slow down the growth of hunger. On the other hand, you can quickly escape the attack range of other players; when facing a taller object, you can jump to the platform with short legs and get close to the target, or you can jump up and eat it directly!

【A game that never eat enough】

After playing for a while, you may find that continuous eating will not relieve your hunger. At best, if you eat enough, your hunger will rise more slowly. At this time, you will find the "sinister" side of this game. It turns out that all the players in the office are a group of people who can’t get enough to eat, unless you win the final victory! ! !

name: Yummy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible soundcard

short_description: "Yummy" is a multiplayer online "hunger" game. In this space where everything can be eaten, you will transform into the food you eat, and you will be hiding and hurting each other with all players. survive to the end..Bring your friends to compete!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
